rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C130278

self.title: CDISC Questionnaire WHODAS 2.0 12-item Version Self-administered Test Name Terminology

definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12-Item Self test name.
name: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12-Item Self Questionnaire Test Name
preferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire WHODAS 2.0 12-item Version Self-administered Test Name Terminology
synonyms: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12-Item Self Questionnaire Test Name

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Taking care of your household responsibilities?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12-item Version Self-administered - Care of Household Responsibilities

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Concentrating on doing something for ten minutes?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12-item Version Self-administered - Concentrating for Ten Minutes

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12-Item Self - In the past 30 days, for how many days were you totally unable to carry out your usual activities or work because of any health condition?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12-item Version Self-administered - Days Unable to Carry Out Activities
terms.submissionValue: WD3-Days Unable to Carry Out Activities
synonyms: WD3-Days Unable to Carry Out Activities

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Dealing with people you do not know?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12-item Version Self-administered - Dealing With People You Do Not Know
terms.submissionValue: WD3-Dealing With People You Do Not Know
synonyms: WD3-Dealing With People You Do Not Know

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: How much have you been emotionally affected by your health problems?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12-item Version Self-administered - Emotionally Affected by Health

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Getting dressed?
World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12-Item Self - Overall, in the past 30 days, how many days were these difficulties present?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12-item Version Self-administered - How Many Days Difficulties Present

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12-Item Self - In the past 30 days, not counting the days that you were totally unable, for how many days did you cut back or reduce your usual activities or work because of any health condition?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12-item Version Self-administered - How Many Days Reduce Activities

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Learning a new task, for example, learning how to get to a new place?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12-item Version Self-administered - Learning a New Task

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Maintaining a friendship?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12-item Version Self-administered - Maintaining a Friendship

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: How much of a problem did you have joining in community activities (for example, festivities, religious or other activities) in the same way as anyone else can?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12-item Version Self-administered - Problem Joining Community Activities

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Standing for long periods such as 30 minutes?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12-item Version Self-administered - Standing for Long Periods

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Walking a long distance such as a kilometre [or equivalent]?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12-item Version Self-administered - Walking a Long Distance

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Washing your whole body?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12-item Version Self-administered - Washing Your Whole Body

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Your day-to-day work?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12-item Version Self-administered - Your Day-to-Day Work or School
